definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: circlet, border (orig. that which presses, binds, cf. also Aram. ziyro0 bracelet, [[זִירָא]] wreath, crown, NH [[זִיר]] id., [[זִירָה]] ring, wrestler's ring; others fr. a √ [[זרר]])—[[זֵר זֵהָב]] Ex 25:11, Ex 25:24, Ex 25:25, Ex 30:3, Ex 37:2, Ex 37:11, Ex 37:12, Ex 37:26; [[זֵרוֹ]] Ex 30:4, Ex 37:27 (all P).
